title: When the game has been going on for 50+ mins, and you really need to pee
body:
But a major teamfight could start at any time.
http://o.aolcdn.com/hss/storage/midas/da31d465749e3be9b86a2e5df99e45c5/202419847/dogpost12.gif

replies.body: Been here too many times, man. Bladder OP
If {{champion:245}} leaves the game to use the restroom, and then ults back to before he left, does he need to use the restroom still?

Well, if we look at Seconds for a reference, Ekko heals most of the damage done, but not entirely. His arms gets literally shattered by the brute, but after he goes back it's just very injured.

So, Ekko pissing and ulting back his seat means he still has to pee, just a little less than before :P
So what if he peed like 10 times, would he then be good?
Just think about the cooldown reduction needed for that, though
He could sell all of his items, build full CD, leave the game to use the restroom, and reset to before he sold his items.
Time travel. Giver of headaches since...before the time machine.
URF mode OPP

Probably? We'd have to do some number-crunching to figure out the exact % loss each time around. At any rate, Ekko'd probably just use it to avoid pissing himself during a late-game teamfight. So long as he can stall long enough, the game will eventually end :P

>Well, if we look at Seconds for a reference,

You know, on second thought maybe *experiencing pissing in reverse* isn't such a good idea after all.
No, his former body will be getting up to do the same thing

You have not thought about this clearly.
What if he has to SHIT?

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=VsFT0YTd,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-11-12T18:40:09.494+0000)
>
> If {{champion:245}} leaves the game to use the restroom, and then ults back to before he left, does he need to use the restroom still?

What if he casts his ult a little too soon...

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=VsFT0YTd,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-11-12T18:40:09.494+0000)
>
> If {{champion:245}} leaves the game to use the restroom, and then ults back to before he left, does he need to use the restroom still?

He'd feel slightly relieved, but will need to go anyway at some point.

Don't worry, Riot is making it so games no longer go past 30 minutes!
https://youtu.be/BIanXyiHu8o?t=10s[](https://youtu.be/BIanXyiHu8o?t=10s)

CMON do something already, I GOTTA PEE
http://i.imgur.com/lcHdoDi.gifv

When this happens, I pray that the enemy kills me, so I can go piss whilst dead.
 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

Ah sorry Laughing Fish, after the patch most games are done around 25-30 minutes if there is no surrender.  

http://media.giphy.com/media/dH7SEJOb6qASI/giphy.gif

You used the I Am Legend scene and now I feel really emotional...
Poor Sam...

http://wac.450f.edgecastcdn.net/80450F/fun107.com/files/2013/05/not-gonna-cry.gif

Not even...

https://media2.giphy.com/media/jou4Cd2mx1lGU/200.gif

FUCK

that is why i keep a bottle next to me

> [{quoted}](name=DuhPaikiller,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=VsFT0YTd,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-11-13T04:35:35.623+0000)
>
> that is why i keep a bottle next to me

That's some dedication right there.
If you are playing Illaio and you are in this scenario I guess you could call it a Test of Spirit.

"When a game has been going on for ~~50+~~ 20 minutes and you really need to pee

But ~~a major teamfight could start at any time~~ your team is getting roflstomped and there's literally no way back from it thanks to minion mechanics update and snowball meta.

http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/newsfeed/000/571/700/c3a.gif
Dunsparce can fly?
New minions are coming in 5.23...

Can I not talk about the PBE?

I won't talk about the PBE. I'm sorry.
thats why i keep a couple cups round me
Aw man why did you have to use this gif... literally any other would be better for this... All this gif does is make me sad remembering that moment in the movie
That's when you look for a fight, hope you get killed (just don't get killed on purpose) and then use the re-spawn time to take your bathroom break.
yes. perfect. just perfect.
well good news for you mr.tiny bladder, riot has heard your complaints about this issue and made games 30 minutes long MAX
they made everything so fucking fast and snowball everything is decided by the 15 minute mark
We haven't got that in OCE yet, but it sounds horrible. Is that seriously what Riot did?

Not really. People are just so confused and baffled by the new stuff while they're complaining about some things being 'too OP' that when they start losing, they instantly start pointing fingers at each other and at the preseason changes and do a lot less playing the game and a lot more time joining the circlejerk, so they lose the game right then and there.

we certainly are baffled, were baffled why thy nerfed AP items,were baffled why they made greaves essentially a AD Leblanc that can jungle, were baffled why yasuo can get 100% crit chance with 2 items and gets 15% lifesteal on crits and 20% attack speed increase when he crits (as a mastery)

> [{quoted}](name=hobomann2,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=VsFT0YTd,comment-id=000b00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-14T16:26:50.092+0000)
>
> we certainly are baffled, were baffled why thy nerfed AP items,were baffled why they made greaves essentially a AD Leblanc that can jungle, were baffled why yasuo can get 100% crit chance with 2 items and gets 15% lifesteal on crits and 20% attack speed increase when he crits (as a mastery)

What nerfs..? 5 armor off of Zhonya's..? lol. And don't even say price increases because every final item had a price increase.

give or take 10-20 minutes, depending on whoever won at the 10 minute mark on how they take there time, nothings close,nothings strategic anymore, just walk to mid lane at around the first tower kill and run into eachother like its fucking beyblade
